name: Please Stop Following Me Mr. Death

metadata.name: A girl and a familiar stranger
metadata.description:
I know he has been following me everywhere since my first breath. He is always there, waiting patiently and silently but I try to reject his presence. The older I get, the closer he gets to me. Please Mr. Death I want to live my life like there is no tomorrow. Wishing my fragile happiness will last a bit longerâ€¦
